thread.title: adidas Unveils Two New Colorways of the Ultraboost Uncaged 2.0
thread.title_full: adidas Unveils Two New Colorways of the Ultraboost Uncaged 2.0

author: Jonathan Sawyer
title: adidas Unveils Two New Colorways of the Ultraboost Uncaged 2.0
text:
Visit the original post to see all 2 images from this gallery. 
Ahead of the impending release, adidas has unveiled a pair of upcoming colorways of its new Ultra Boost Uncaged 2.0.
Arriving in grey, as well as black and white, the lightweight low-tops boast a sock-like fit at the collar, in addition to Boost tooling underneath. The grey pair welcomes a white Boost midsole, while the black and white iteration in turn features black Boost detail. Tonal laces then accompany to complete each delivery.
As for now, no release information has been disclosed for the Ultra Boost Uncaged 2.0, but be sure to check back with us for more.
For some sneaker heat you can go ahead and pick up, take a look at the best kicks arriving this weekend.
